timeline.body: Please add symbol ⤶ to the end of the each line (\u2936) to make it clear.

timeline.body:

```java

 *⤶
 * }⤶
// violation, the file ends with a new line, but not in the requested format
```

timeline.author: pbludov
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -88,6 +88,19 @@ * 
  * <module name="NewlineAtEndOfFile"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * // File ending with a new line
+ * public class Test {
+ *
+ * }
+ * // ok
+ *
+ * // File ending without a new line
+ * public class Test1 {
+ *
+ * } // violation, the file does not end with a new line

timeline.body: Same here. There should be no `⤶` symbol on the last line. It is assumed that the file ends immediately after the `}`' character.
timeline.bodyText: Same here. There should be no ⤶ symbol on the last line. It is assumed that the file ends immediately after the }' character.

timeline.body:
This file ends with two `⤶` symbols. It should be simple
```
 }⤶// ok
```
For clarity, please add a note like
The `// ok` comment is "virtual", not actually present in the file.

timeline.body: The violation message for this case is `Expected line ending for file is LF(\\n), but CRLF(\\r\\n) is detected`, please change description to reflect that here line separator is different, no LF

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -96,6 +109,19 @@ * <property name="lineSeparator" value="lf"/> * </module> * + *

Example:

+ * 
+ * // File ending with a new line
+ * public class Test {⤶
+ * ⤶
+ * }⤶ // ok
+ * Note: The comment // ok is a virtual, not actually present in the file
+ *
+ * // File ending without a new line

+ * ⤶
+ * }␍⤶ // violation, the file must end with LF only
